EmailTemplate.description: CS-Unreferenceable Multinational Banking and FS Customer
EmailTemplate.name: NA_Commercial_Financial Services_Cold_Nurture.FinancialServices_Cold_Nurture_Com
EmailTemplate.subject: Maximize Resource Utilization & Save Time with Automated VM Placement & Storage Motions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/case-studies/cisco-banking-case-study]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Reluctant to adopt workload automation in your environment? Here’s how Turbonomic and Cisco <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/case-studies/cisco-banking-case-study]]> delivered self-managing infrastructure that enables automated VM placement and storage motions for this banking and financial leader with a large infrastructure footprint including 6,490 hosts and 56,000 VMs.
As a result, the customer is on the path towards fully utilizing their resources, so far unlocking 3,790GHZ of CPU, 775TB or Memory, and 2148TB or storage.
Want to learn more? See how over 1,900 customers <[[https://turbonomic.com/customers/customers-by-industry/]]> leverage workload automation to simultaneously optimize performance, cost and policy compliance in real-time.
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
